name: Tuxera Inc.
bullets: Created automated testing framework for many of our embedded flash filesystems
Created product demo comparing our embedded filesystem powerfail capabilities against FatFS on STM32 hardware
Helped with testing efforts on enterprise-grade network storage solutions

name: Pinkaloo Technologies

Centralized entire mail system into one micro-service
Automated front-end testing and security audits on our back-end and front-end, logging results daily to Slack through our CD/CI pipeline tool

name: UF Surgeon Simulation Lab
bullets: Worked on custom Blender plug-in (python) to export complex 3D objects and lighting to XML for use in simulation engines
Updated entire team’s version control from mercurial to git
Product to be used in human and veterinarian surgeon training

name: Ultimate Software Internship
bullets: Streamlined the company’s documentation process by developing containerized instances of the documentation website, reducing downtime on the production site

name: Ultimate Software Internship
bullets: Redesigned change-management process used throughout the company in order to save work time by creating a full-stack web application to manage request forms
